formifan2002/ioBroker.abfallkalender.description: ADAPTER HAS BEEN DEPRECEATED. PLEASE USE ioBroker.trashmaster instead ! The adapter reads the waste collection dates from the provider abfall.io, which various cities use. In addition, two widgets for VIS 2 are included. If the Whatsapp adapter is installed, automatic sending of messages per waste types are supported.
